channel.title: Help, making model - re-colouring! ##NVM FIXED IT##
channel.description:
Yo, ive made my model but im having troubles re-colouring it! Ive managed it before, but i took a 3 week break, and now, well ive forgotten!! ARG!!
Ive got my Material Panel up with the colour selected, but now what do i press to colour my models?
Thanks!!
~johno
Oops, figured it out :) Soz

item.title: Help, making model - re-colouring! ##NVM FIXED IT##
item.dc:creator: @johno2 johno2
item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

[quote=“Assassins Creed Fan, post:2, topic:286466”]Left in the middle you see your Command (thingy :P) There’s “Mat” Somewhere.
Click that and then click the faces on your model.

Problem Solved, Mod Lock ;)[/quote]

Cheers, but i figured it out :L

Read full topic
item.source: Help, making model - re-colouring! ##NVM FIXED IT##

item.title: Help, making model - re-colouring! ##NVM FIXED IT##
item.dc:creator: @Assassins_Creed_Fan Assassins Creed Fan
item.description:
@Assassins_Creed_Fan wrote:

Left in the middle you see your Command (thingy :P) There’s “Mat” Somewhere.
Click that and then click the faces on your model.

Problem Solved, Mod Lock
